scripts.build: vite build && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && vite build --config vite.popup.config.ts
scripts.zip:dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run prep:dev && (cd dist && zip -r compre-ai-dev.zip .) && echo 'dist/compre-ai-dev.zip created'
scripts.zip:prod: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run prep:prod && (cd dist && zip -r compre-ai-prod.zip .) && echo 'dist/compre-ai-prod.zip created'
